織女.definition: Vega (star); Weaving girl of folk tales

織女星.definition: Vega, brightest star in constellation Lyra 天琴星座

織田信長.definition: ODA Nobunaga (1534-1582), Japanese shogun (warlord), played an important role in unifying Japan

織當訪婢.definition: if it's weaving, ask the maid (idiom); when managing a matter, consult the appropriate specialist

織造.definition: to weave; to manufacture by weaving

織錦.definition: brocade; silk fabric with colored pattern
